mapper.sql: SELECT pm_version_application.id,pm_version_application.flow_state,pm_version_application.flow_register_time,pm_version_application.project,pm_version_application.application_type,pm_version_application.customer,pm_version_application.licence,pm_version_application.contract_no,pm_version_application.description,pm_version_application.version_info,pm_version_application.flow_note,pm_version_application.add_file,pm_version_application.flow_copy_to_list, (select group_concat(real_name) from sys_user where FIND_IN_SET(id,pm_version_application.flow_copy_to_list)) AS dict_list_flow_copy_to_list ,pm_version_application.flow_register_by,sys_user.real_name AS register_by_name,pm_version_application.flow_next_operator,sys_user1.real_name AS next_operator_name FROM pm_version_application LEFT JOIN sys_user ON pm_version_application.flow_register_by = sys_user.id LEFT JOIN sys_user sys_user1 ON pm_version_application.flow_next_operator = sys_user1.id

SELECT pm_version_application.id,pm_version_application.flow_state,pm_version_application.flow_register_time,pm_version_application.project,pm_version_application.application_type,pm_version_application.customer,pm_version_application.licence,pm_version_application.contract_no,pm_version_application.description,pm_version_application.version_info,pm_version_application.flow_note,pm_version_application.add_file,pm_version_application.flow_copy_to_list, (select CAST(real_name as varchar)+',' from sys_user where CHARINDEX(','+CAST(id as varchar)+',',','+pm_version_application.flow_copy_to_list+',') >0 for xml path('')) AS dict_list_flow_copy_to_list ,pm_version_application.flow_register_by,sys_user.real_name AS register_by_name,pm_version_application.flow_next_operator,sys_user1.real_name AS next_operator_name FROM pm_version_application LEFT JOIN sys_user ON pm_version_application.flow_register_by = sys_user.id LEFT JOIN sys_user sys_user1 ON pm_version_application.flow_next_operator = sys_user1.id

SELECT pm_version_application.id,pm_version_application.flow_state,pm_version_application.flow_register_time,pm_version_application.project,pm_version_application.application_type,pm_version_application.customer,pm_version_application.licence,pm_version_application.contract_no,pm_version_application.description,pm_version_application.version_info,pm_version_application.flow_note,pm_version_application.add_file,pm_version_application.flow_copy_to_list, (select LISTAGG(real_name,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY id) from sys_user where INSTR(','||pm_version_application.flow_copy_to_list||',',','||to_char(id)||',')>0) AS dict_list_flow_copy_to_list ,pm_version_application.flow_register_by,sys_user.real_name AS register_by_name,pm_version_application.flow_next_operator,sys_user1.real_name AS next_operator_name FROM pm_version_application LEFT JOIN sys_user ON pm_version_application.flow_register_by = sys_user.id LEFT JOIN sys_user sys_user1 ON pm_version_application.flow_next_operator = sys_user1.id
mapper.insert:
SELECT replace(uuid(), '-', '')
SELECT replace(lower(newid()), '-', '')
SELECT replace(lower(sys_guid()), '-', '') from dual

into pm_version_application (id,flow_state,flow_register_time,project,application_type,customer,licence,contract_no,description,version_info,flow_note,add_file,flow_copy_to_list,flow_register_by,flow_next_operator) values(replace(lower(sys_guid()), '-', ''),#{item.flowState,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.flowRegisterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.project,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.applicationType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.versionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.flowNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.addFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.flowCopyToList,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.flowRegisterBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.flowNextOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.delete: delete from pm_version_application where id in #{item}

mapper.update: update pm_version_application set flow_state = #{flowState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flow_register_time = #{flowRegisterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, application_type = #{applicationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer = #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licence = #{licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_no = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version_info = #{versionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_note = #{flowNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_file = #{addFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_copy_to_list = #{flowCopyToList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_register_by = #{flowRegisterBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_next_operator = #{flowNextOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update pm_version_application set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=CHAR}, flow_state = #{record.flowState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flow_register_time = #{record.flowRegisterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project = #{record.project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, application_type = #{record.applicationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer = #{record.customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licence = #{record.licence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_no = #{record.contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version_info = #{record.versionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_note = #{record.flowNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_file = #{record.addFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_copy_to_list = #{record.flowCopyToList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_register_by = #{record.flowRegisterBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_next_operator = #{record.flowNextOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
